author: Zack Budryk
title: Michigan governor: May be appropriate to open businesses that 'pose very little risk'
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) on Thursday said that she was open to reopening businesses in the state that "pose very little risk" of spreading the coronavirus."[It's] appropriate to keep doing that assessment...
content:
Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) on Thursday said that she was open to reopening businesses in the state that pose very little risk of spreading the coronavirus.
"[Its] appropriate to keep doing that assessment. We may have some announcements in the coming… [+2127 chars]
